bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zhi chuang 痔瘡 , piles sores, with the tumorous flesh-growths breaking open to all sides like blossoms. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu gua 木瓜 quoting Yi xue ji cheng 醫學集成 : 反花痔 瘡：木瓜為末，以鱔魚身上涎調，貼之，以紙護住 , “ Reversed-blossoms piles sores: grind mu gua to powder, mix with phlegm from the body of eels, and attach [to the piles]. Fix with paper”. Original writing: fan hua zhi 翻花痔 , “piles like blossoms turned inside out”.
